translation.ja: ジョニー･イングリッシュ…

translation.en: Took his eye off the ball in Mozambique.

translation.en: Does it have to be him?

translation.en: He's the only one our contact will talk to.
translation.ja: 情報提供者からの指名だ
〝解雇〞 〝解雇〞 彼は今 どこに？ 彼は今 どこに？

translation.en: You came here to forget your life of shame.
translation.ja: チベット 山岳地帯 お前は過去の恥を 忘れるために― お前は過去の恥を 忘れるために― ここへ来た

translation.en: But the path you must tread...
translation.ja: しかし― 新たな人生への道は―

translation.en: will be not be easy, English.
translation.ja: 生易しいものではない
修行の目指すものは ただ１つ
柔らかいモノを固くすること
修行の道は長く険しい

translation.en: Mind... must be master of the body.
translation.ja: 精神の力で 肉体を支配するのだ

translation.en: Strong mind can separate the body...
translation.ja: 強い心を持つ者は 肉体の痛みを―

translation.en: Sorry? [ GASPS ] Hot! Hot! Hot, hot!
translation.ja: えっ？ アヂッ アヂッ！

translation.en: When mind is master of the body,
translation.ja: 精神が肉体を支配した時―

translation.en: you will be warrior once more.
translation.ja: お前は戦士となって甦(よみがえ)る
導師様 今後の私の運命は？

translation.en: I'm in touch with a higher power.
translation.ja: 大いなる者より お告げを頂こう
ＭＩ-７が― 一番の便でロンドンへ戻れと

translation.en: on the first flight back to London.
translation.ja: 一番の便でロンドンへ戻れと
座席は窓側か 通路側か？

translation.en: - Good morning, sir. Can I help you? - Johnny English.

パメラ･ソーントン ＭＩ-７の部長よ

translation.en: You've been away for some time, English.
translation.ja: 長年 ＭＩ-７を 離れていたのに―

translation.en: But you haven't been forgotten. Hmm.
People here often talk about your adventures in Mozambique. ♪ [ DRUMMING ]
translation.ja: モザンビークでの活躍は エージェントたちの語り草

translation.en: Well, MI7 has come a long way since then.
translation.ja: あれからＭＩ-７も 変貌(へんぼう)を遂げ―

translation.en: The guns, the fast cars and the chauvinism are all on their way out.

translation.en: Frankly, I didn't want to see you back.
translation.ja: 本来なら あなたは邪魔者

translation.en: You are everything I came into this service to change.

translation.en: But my hands are tied-- [ YOWLS ]

translation.en: There's a good puss. There's a good puss.
translation.ja: よしよし かわいいニャンコだね

translation.en: There's a good pussy. Who's a good pussy?
I'm impressed. Who's a good pussy?
Philby never lets strangers pick him up.
translation.ja: 他人には なつかないのに

translation.en: Oh, I'm very much at one with the animal kingdom.
Meow. There's a good puss. [ PURRING ]
translation.ja: 気持ちいいのかい よしよし

translation.en: I know, I know. Who's lovely? Who's lovely?

ケイト･サマー ＭＩ-７の行動心理学の専門家

translation.en: I've heard a great deal about you. Glowing reports, I trust.

translation.en: Monitor observable behavior for signs of internal psychology.
translation.ja: 人の行動を観察して 心の動きを探るんです
人を読む では今度 お食事でも

translation.ja: では今度 お食事でも

translation.en: I think you'll find me a real page-turner.
translation.ja: 私は傑作な小説ですから
ペガサス その非常事態とは？

translation.en: He has intelligence of a plot to assassinate the Chinese premier...
translation.ja: “中国の首相の 暗殺計画がある”

translation.en: at the Anglo-Chinese talks next week.
We need you to go and find out what he's got.
Well, in that case, Pegasus, count me in.

translation.en: Agent One will meet you downstairs.

translation.en: So, I just scaled the walls, blew the whole place to kingdom come.

translation.en: An hour later, I'm sitting in the bar with a White Russian in my hand.
translation.ja: １時間後には優雅に飲んでた

translation.en: Who was very lovely, too, I can tell you. [ PEOPLE LAUGHING ]

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. Five years, three months and six days, or something.

translation.en: That was a balls-up with a cherry on top.
translation.ja: ハデに やらかしたな

translation.en: Come on. Let's get you sorted.

translation.en: I won't leave you my number.

知ってるとも 久しぶりだ ジョニー 立たないで

translation.en: Have to be this one, I'm afraid.
Lost this to the D-10 doorbell. [ CHORTLES ]

translation.en: Ah. Well, it's great to see... what's left of you.
translation.ja: 生きて会えて よかったよ

translation.en: This way. I haven't got all day.
Here she is. Ah. The Rolls-Royce Phantom.

translation.en: Armor plating, all the bells and whistles.

フル装備だ “ボンネット”と言ってみろ ボンネット

translation.en: Here's what you'll be taking to Hong Kong.

translation.en: - Now, what did I just say? - [ WHIRRING ]
That's the new P-2 digital dart gun.
May I remind you all that MI7's current weapon of choice is dialogue?

失礼のないよう 見張り役を―

Well, it'll be good to have somebody to carry the bags.

私が許さない 分かった？

I'm off to Switzerland. Let's catch up when you get back.

君のバアさん 病気

No, no, no. Nothing's the matter. Colin.
Well, I felt a bit funny last night, but I'm okay now.

masterminded by a group of ruthless assassins called Vortex.

- Take that and that! - [ CHILDREN SCREAMING ]
[ GAGGING ] I've got her this time, Pegasus!

Oh. Sorry. I thought I'd forgotten something. Mmm.
I may not know much about golf, Tucker, but I know how to hold the bat.
translation.ja: バットの握り方ぐらい 知ってるよ

translation.en: So, what line of business are you in, Mr. Puddykin?
translation.ja: 仕事は？ プディキン

translation.en: I made my money in the removals business. Ah.
A friend of mine had shares in a removals business.
translation.ja: 私の友達も片づけ屋だよ

translation.en: Titus Fisher. You haven't come across him at all?
translation.ja: タイタス･フィッシャーって 知らないか？

translation.en: I warn you, Mr. Adams, not to stray into the rough.
translation.ja: 探るようなスイングはやめろ

translation.en: You get in there, you might never come out.
I'll bear that in mind, Mr. Puddykin.
translation.ja: 気をつけるよ プディキン
プドフキンだ 覚えてくれ

translation.en: As was my friend Fisher, actually.
translation.ja: フィッシャーも撃たれた(ショット)

translation.en: By his cleaner, of all people.
Break left to right, I think.
He can't die. He mustn't die.
translation.ja: 大変だ 死んでしまう

translation.en: Let's get him out of here. Come on! [ GROANING ]
[ LOUDLY ] We're getting you to a doctor.
translation.ja: 死にそうです 病院へ行きますから 安心して
病院へ行きますから 安心して

translation.en: You do know how to fly these, sir?
It was part of basic training. Good.
It's just like riding a bike.
Yes. It's all coming back to me.

translation.ja: こちらヘリのゴルフ･ホテル･ ズルズル･タンゴ

translation.en: We have a casualty onboard. Request guidance to nearest hospital.
translation.ja: ケガ人がいる 最寄りの病院は？

translation.en: Uh-- She shot out the navigation system.
translation.ja: どこ？ ナビが撃たれた
ランストック 現在地はランストック

translation.en: [ MAN ON RADIO ] What's our altitude? What's our altitude?

translation.ja: もしもし？ もしもし？

translation.en: We'll have to stick to the road.
Let's follow the 1328. There's bound to be a hospital in Dingham.
translation.ja: 1328号線だ ディンガムに病院が

translation.en: - [ PUDOVKIN GROANING ] - Look after him, Tucker. Look after him.
I think we're losing him, sir. We can't lose him, Tucker.
translation.ja: 危ない 死なせるな 唯一の手がかりだ

translation.en: He's our only lead. Try something else.
translation.ja: 死なせるな 唯一の手がかりだ 何とかしろ

translation.en: ♪ Don't give up on us, baby ♪
translation.ja: あきらめないで ベイビー

translation.en: ♪ Lord knows we've come this far ♪
translation.ja: ここまで やって来た ２人じゃないか

translation.en: [ MUMBLES ] ♪ Stay the way we are ♪
♪ Don't give up on us I know ♪
♪ Bom, We could still come through ♪
translation.ja: まだ乗り越えられるさ

translation.en: ♪ Don't give up on us, baby ♪
♪ Don't give up on us, baby ♪

translation.ja: まだ乗り越えられるさ

translation.en: [ TUCKER ] Look, sir! Follow that ambulance!
translation.ja: 見て 救急車がいます
カルレンコ カルレンコ
ボルテックスの３人は― ＫＧＢと…

translation.en: There's a mole and a vole?
No, sir. There's-- There's a mole, not a vole.
translation.ja: いえ モグラだけです リスでなく

translation.en: Well, I disagree. There's certainly a vole. I mean, we know that much.
translation.ja: いや リスだよ それだけは確かだ

translation.en: But what you're saying is there might be a mole as well.
translation.ja: しかしモグラも いるかもしれん

translation.en: There's a meeting at MI7 with the prime minister.
translation.ja: ＭＩ-７へ首相を迎えて会議が

translation.en: And here again, eyes down and to the left, indicating dissent.
translation.ja: 〝ＭＩ-７本部〞 〝ＭＩ-７本部〞 視線が左下へ向く 不満な証拠 視線が左下へ向く 不満な証拠

translation.en: With Xiang Ping, it's all about the eyes. Thank you, Ms. Sumner.
translation.ja: 彼は目に出ます ありがとう

translation.en: If the talks go ahead, I'd like you with us.
So, when is the prime minister going to grace us with his presence?
translation.ja: 首相は いつ おいでになるのかな？

translation.en: Um, all right. So we're all here.
These talks with China are of paramount importance.
translation.ja: 中国首相との会談は きわめて重要だ

translation.en: Rogue states in Southeast Asia have begun secretly to develop nuclear weapons.
translation.ja: ならず者国家が 核兵器を開発する中―

translation.en: It is vital that we get China onside.
translation.ja: 中国との協調関係は不可欠だ

translation.en: Traditionally, China has been impervious to our concerns,
but I believe Xiang Ping, given the opportunity,
translation.ja: ジャン･ピン首相も 機会をとらえて―

translation.en: can and will help defuse this situation.
translation.ja: ジャン･ピン首相も 機会をとらえて― 同調するはずだ

translation.en: [ FOREIGN SECRETARY ] Well, with his pro-West stance, it certainly offers an opportunity.
translation.ja: 欧米寄りの彼にとって 会談は絶好の機会

translation.en: The talks can't go ahead unless we can guarantee his safety.
translation.ja: だが まずは 身の安全を保証せねば

translation.en: I believe, with the correct security, that we can.
If Vortex is operational, it's just too dangerous.
translation.ja: 暗殺計画がある以上 危険です

translation.en: I'm inclined to agree, Prime Minister.
translation.ja: 私も同感です 首相

translation.en: The Swiss are willing to lend us Le Bastion.
translation.ja: スイスの要塞を借りるのです

translation.en: That's their government fortress in the Alps.
It's a stunning example of architectural engineering at altitude...
translation.ja: 山岳建築としても 見事な建物です

translation.en: I mean, that should solve all our security issues.
translation.ja: 警備の面では理想的です

translation.en: Pamela, I hope you've brushed up on your Mandarin.
translation.ja: パメラ 中国語を磨き―

translation.en: I'd like you in the room with me, and your best man on security.
translation.ja: 会談に同席を 最高のエージェントもな
イングリッシュ？ ３人組です

translation.en: Fisher was one, Karlenko was another.
translation.ja: ２人はフィッシャーと カルレンコ

translation.en: Karlenko was killed today on the orders of the third.
translation.ja: ３人目の指令により カルレンコは殺された

translation.en: We need to know the identity of the third person in Vortex.
translation.ja: 急いで３人目の正体を 突き止めねば

translation.en: Of course. And would you like to choose dessert? Yes. You.
translation.ja: デザートは？ 決めたよ 君だ

translation.en: So, come on, Johnny. What was it you wanted to ask me?
Simon, do you know what this is?
translation.ja: サイモン これが何か 分かるか？

translation.en: Karlenko and Fisher both had one,
translation.ja: カルレンコたちは これのために―

translation.en: and they were both killed for them.
give it to the boys at the lab and see--
Karlenko told me that the third man in Vortex...
translation.ja: カルレンコは言った “３人目のメンバーは―”

translation.en: Simon, I have to ask you a question...
translation.ja: サイモン 正直に答えてくれ

translation.en: Do you have any idea who it might be?
translation.ja: その人物に 心当たりはないか？

translation.en: [ CHUCKLING ] Johnny. I thought you were about to accuse me.
translation.ja: てっきり僕を疑ってるのかと
まさか！ そんなこと あり得ん

translation.en: Simon Ambrose, the evil mastermind! Don't. Stop it!
A traitor in our midst! You! You!
Oh! Simon, you are so funny.
Would you excuse me for one moment, Simon?
translation.ja: “トイレへ タッカー” ちょっと失礼するよ
ヤボだぞ サイモンです

translation.en: Yes, I know it's Ambrose. I'm having dinner with him.
translation.ja: そうとも サイモンだ

translation.en: No, he's the third man in Vortex.
What are you-- Move. Come on, move. All right.
You said you never knew Karlenko.
Then how do you explain these?
I hacked into Karlenko's computer. You and him in Mozambique?
translation.ja: 彼のＰＣに侵入したら モザンビークでの写真が

translation.en: Sometimes I have trouble myself, old boy. [ CHUCKLES ]
translation.ja: 私も近頃 出にくくてね

translation.en: You're Vortex. You're the third man in Vortex.
[ URINATING ] Sorry. I'll be with you in just a tick.
It's true. I was in Mozambique.
I was there because of Patch Quartermain.
translation.ja: パッチの殺人を 阻止するためだ

translation.en: Oh. Sorry. I'll just be one second.
He's the man you're after. [ ZIPPER ZIPS ]
I work for a secret organization inside MI7...
translation.ja: 僕はＭＩ-７内の― 秘密組織の一員で 任務はパッチの逮捕だ

translation.en: set up specifically to bring him in.
translation.ja: 秘密組織の一員で 任務はパッチの逮捕だ
“アーミテージ” アーミテージだ

translation.en: A secret, secret Secret Service called Armitage?
translation.ja: 秘密の秘密組織の名が アーミテージ？

translation.en: We answer only to the P.M.
That you'd think for one moment...
translation.ja: 君は一瞬でも考えたのか

translation.en: that I would fall for such a steaming pile... of old baloney.
translation.ja: この私が そんな作り話に 引っかかるとでも？

translation.en: Well done, Tucker. You're not Spy of the Month for nothing.
translation.ja: お手柄だ “今月のスパイ”だよ

translation.en: Thank you, sir. Here, let me take that.
translation.ja: お手柄だ “今月のスパイ”だよ どうも これは私が

translation.en: You're in way over your head, boy. Now run along.
translation.ja: 君の手に負える問題じゃない

translation.en: No! I won't go, sir. He's lying.
translation.ja: 違います 彼はウソを

translation.en: You've let me down, you've let the service down,
translation.ja: 君には私もＭＩ-７も ガッカリだ

translation.en: and, frankly, I think you've let yourself down.
translation.ja: 君には私もＭＩ-７も ガッカリだ 君自身もだろ？
よりによって あのパッチがね

translation.en: Blowing his own legs off? Now that's what I call deep cover.
translation.ja: 足を吹っ飛ばしたのも 正体を隠すため

translation.en: And to think how much I admired him.
He thinks you're a moron with no place in MI7.
translation.ja: 君は大ボケ野郎で ＭＩ-７の恥
うぬぼれ屋の雑魚(ザコ)だと

translation.en: That's why he tried to destroy you.
just because he ruined your life, that's no reason for you to go rogue and take him down on your own.
translation.ja: いくら彼に恨みがあっても 君１人で捕まえようとするな

translation.en: God forbid I should put a crazy idea like that in your head.
translation.ja: 今の忠告で かえって その気になるなよ
ジョニー さっきのカギだが―

translation.en: That key you showed me-- We might need it to bring him in.
translation.ja: ジョニー さっきのカギだが― 逮捕に必要かも

translation.en: Arrange a meeting with our client. Of course.
translation.ja: 依頼主に 連絡するわ

translation.en: It's all over for you now, English. It's the end of the line.
translation.ja: もう終わりだ イングリッシュ 君の命運も尽きた

translation.en: Yes, you'd like that, wouldn't you, Patch?
After all, I'm just a jumped-up grammar school nobody, aren't I?
translation.ja: どうせ私は うぬぼれ屋の雑魚だからな

translation.en: [ CHUCKLES ] What are you talking about?
I know that you are the third man in Vortex.
translation.ja: 何を言ってる？ 知ってるんだ ボルテックスの３人目は 君だと
君は ここで捕まる

translation.en: Oi! Who do you think you are?
translation.ja: おい 何様のつもりだ？

translation.en: [ AGENT ON SPEAKER ] Agent English, pull over! Pull over!
translation.ja: ジョニー･イングリッシュ 止まれ
私はボルテックスじゃない

translation.en: Same as in Mozambique. One person, apparently working alone.
translation.ja: モザンビークの時と同じだ 実行役は１人

translation.en: You're lucky it was just a flesh wound.
translation.ja: かすり傷で よかったわ

translation.en: Look. I'm going to Switzerland tonight, but you can stay here while I'm gone.
translation.ja: 今夜 私はスイスへ でも ここは使って

translation.en: I've been going through the news footage from the night Chambal was killed.
translation.ja: 大統領暗殺のニュース映像を 調べたの

translation.en: Seconds after President Chambal was shot, the assassin collapses and dies.
translation.ja: 犯人は大統領を撃った直後に 倒れて即死

translation.en: - [ GROANS ] - And the autopsy says heart failure.
if you go through the classified CCTV footage--
translation.ja: 監視カメラの映像を よく見ると…
暗殺の― 15分前の彼は動きがおかしい
15分前の彼は動きがおかしい

translation.en: He's completely lost control of his body.

translation.ja: 突然 ピタリと動かなくなった

translation.en: I don't think he had any idea what he was doing.
translation.ja: 彼は無意識に大統領を撃った

translation.en: And only one fits the symptoms.
translation.ja: 症状からすると これよ
ティモクセリン･ バルビブテノール

translation.en: The C.I.A. ordered its destruction 10 years ago.
translation.ja: ティモクセリン･ バルビブテノール 10年前 ＣＩＡが 廃棄命令を出した

translation.en: And the agent in charge of its disposal--
translation.ja: 廃棄の責任者だった エージェントが…
タイタス･フィッシャー

translation.en: I don't know how to thank you.
So, Johnny, what are you going to do about Vortex?
translation.ja: 暗殺計画をどうするの？

translation.en: If only Simon was here. He'd know what to do.
translation.ja: さあ… サイモンなら ひらめくだろうが

translation.en: Why do you think he's better than you?
translation.ja: 彼は そんなにすごい？

translation.en: Come-- Well, the man's a god.
translation.ja: そうとも 彼は神だ
腹立たしいほど愚直な人間が

translation.en: I've come to realize that what's really exciting to me...
translation.ja: 私が強く惹(ひ)かれるのは―
誠実な心や強い意志や―

translation.en: You have always fascinated me... clinically.
translation.ja: だから惹かれるの 臨床学的に
頬も ほんのり赤い

translation.en: Ms. Sumner, I believe we're emotionally...
translation.ja: ケイト 僕たち 顔から感情が―

translation.en: Are you ready? I'll drive you to the airport.
Oh, how nice. I'll just get my bag.
translation.ja: うれしいわ カバンを

translation.en: [ WHISPERING ] Should I-- Are you alone?
Been brushing up on the Chinese P.M. You?
translation.ja: 中国の首相のことをね あなたは？

translation.en: Oh, we're trying to track down Johnny English.
translation.ja: イングリッシュの追跡を

translation.en: There are some questions we want to ask him... about Vortex.
translation.ja: 彼に問いたださねば ボルテックスの件で

translation.en: I don't suppose you've seen him, have you? No.
translation.ja: 彼を見たか？ いいえ

translation.en: There's a Mr. Adams to see you, Colin.
Hello, Tucker. What are you doing here?
Every agent in the country's after you.
If we act fast, we can-- You wouldn't listen, would you?
translation.ja: 今すぐ… 僕を無視した

translation.en: You think you know it all. Well, you don't!
Being an agent means everything to me.
translation.ja: 憧れのエージェントに なった僕は―

translation.en: And, thanks to you, I'm suspended!
translation.ja: あなたのせいで停職だ

translation.en: Would you boys like some orange squash?
translation.ja: オレンジ･スカッシュは？

translation.en: No, thank you. No, thanks, Mum.

translation.ja: タッカー サイモンはスイスへ だが私はここに来た
サイモンはスイスへ だが私はここに来た

translation.en: I am here because my country needs me.
translation.ja: 国を守る使命があるからだ

translation.en: And because it needs you too.
translation.ja: 英国は君を必要としてる

translation.en: Set the sat nav for Switzerland. Let's kick some bottom.
translation.ja: 目的地はスイスだ 飛ばすぞ

translation.en: [ ROYCE ] You have arrived at your destination.
One way up, one way down.
[ JOHNNY ] Come on. Let's get the stuff.
Whoa, look. The T2 ground-to-air missile.
translation.ja: すげえ！ Ｔ２ 地対空ミサイルだ
それはＤ７ 防弾シールド

translation.en: Take it from me, Tucker. I was working with these while you were stringing conkers.
translation.ja: 私は これらを 君がガキの頃から使ってる
高さは？ 約10メートル

translation.en: The D-16 ascender, and up we go.
translation.ja: Ｄ16 縄ばしごは これだ

translation.en: Are you sure that's the ascender, sir?
Yes, yes. I'd know it anywhere.
[ MALE VOICE ] Agent in distress. Agent in distress.
translation.ja: 私はエージェント 救助を願います

translation.en: Agent in distress. Agent in distress.
translation.ja: 私はエージェント 救助を願います

translation.en: Dear God, let me not die at the hands of the Swiss.
translation.ja: スイス人には殺されたくない

translation.en: I want you to attack me. What?
After a struggle, you can "arrest me"... and take me inside as your prisoner.
translation.ja: 少し もみ合って 私を捕まえ 中へ連れてけ

translation.en: I see how people get the taste for this.
I've got a better idea! I'll shoot you!
translation.ja: そうだ 銃で撃ちます
それはイングリッシュだ

translation.en: The glass can withstand mortar attack.
The door is one-way. You can get out, but no one gets in.
translation.ja: 出られるが入れないドア

translation.en: I'll, uh, have them send refreshments to your room... when you're ready, Pegasus.
translation.ja: 部屋へ飲み物を届けますよ ペガサス

translation.en: I'll take it from here, boys.
Let me see your I.D. Um--
Warning: This is a designated conflict zone.
[ PEGASUS ] Thank you so much. You're welcome, Pegasus.
translation.ja: ありがとう いいえ
イングリッシュ ペガサス

translation.en: They're going to make you kill Xiang Ping!
He's the third member of Vortex.
Here to give you some Timoxy Bubby--
that will make you obey his every command.
translation.ja: 彼の命令に 従わせようとしてた

translation.en: How exactly were you going to administer it?
translation.ja: どうやってペガサスに薬を？

translation.en: Some hideous gas through the air vents?
translation.ja: 通気口からガスを入れる？
ティモクセリン･ バルビブテノール

translation.en: He'll enter the manic phase any moment now.
translation.ja: 今にも 体は 抑制が利かなくなる

translation.en: [ CHUCKLES ] I have to warn you... that I've been trained to resist this kind of thing.
translation.ja: 薬など効かんよ 鍛えてるからね

translation.en: Oh, he's quite harmless at this phase.
But just before it does, there will be a short window... where he'll do everything I tell him to.
translation.ja: ただし その直前 僕の命令に従ってからな

translation.en: You were never really MI7, Johnny. You were never really one of us.
translation.ja: ジョニー 今まで君は ＭＩ-７のゴミだったが―

translation.en: And now you're about to become our most famous agent.
translation.ja: これで立派に名を残す

translation.en: You'll now do exactly as I tell you.
translation.ja: 僕の言う通りに行動するんだ

translation.en: You are a traitor to the service and to your country.
translation.ja: あなたは祖国の裏切り者よ

translation.en: Okay, Slater. Let's get him ready.
translation.ja: スレーター 準備しろ

translation.en: Premier Ping, it's a pleasure to finally meet you.
translation.ja: ジャン･ピン首相 ようこそ

translation.en: You had a pleasant flight, I trust?
[ OVER SPEAKER ] I was just asking the premier if he had a pleasant flight.
translation.ja: 空の旅は快適だったかと

translation.en: Kate, Johnny's back on the team. What?
It's all checked out, and the P.M. and the Chinese have approved it.
Approved what? He's standing in for Pamela. Isn't it great? [ EXHALES ]
translation.ja: パメラの代役を務める
エージェント･タッカー

translation.en: [ PRIME MINISTER ] Good. Good. And your wife is well?
translation.ja: そうですか 奥様は お元気で？

translation.en: Premier, I am most grateful you have agreed to meet me at this time.
translation.ja: 今回の会談にお越し下さり 感謝の意を表します

translation.en: It is our pleasure. [ SPEAKING CHINESE ]
Maintain that tone, Prime Minister. Avoid confrontation. Keep eye contact.
translation.ja: にこやかに 視線を外さずに

translation.en: I can assure you that the Chinese people...
have always regarded the British people...
translation.ja: 英国人を こう思ってます

translation.en: I was very keen to meet.
Johnny, stand up and go to the water table.
translation.ja: 立ってテーブルの前へ行け

translation.en: Well, it's too bloody late now.
Now, Johnny, I want you to kill Xiang Ping.
translation.ja: さあ ジャン･ピン首相を殺せ

translation.en: He's being controlled. [ FOREIGN SECRETARY ] By who?
translation.ja: 彼は操られてる 誰に？

translation.en: Mind... must be master of the body.
translation.ja: 精神の力で― 肉体を支配するのだ

translation.en: His left hand is fighting the right hand.
translation.ja: 左手で右手を抑えてる

translation.en: [ TUCKER ] If I can interrupt the frequency, I could stop Ambrose from communicating with him.
translation.ja: サイモンの指令に 侵入して止める

translation.en: He'll be dead in 50 seconds, sir.

translation.ja: よし よし 〝音楽局〞 〝音楽局〞

translation.en: ♪ Wave your hands in the air like you don't care ♪
translation.ja: 両手を上げて   思いっきり振れ

translation.en: ♪ Glide by the people as they start to look and stare ♪
translation.ja: 人が どう思おうと    気にするな

translation.en: ♪ Do your dance, do your dance ♪ ♪ Do your dance quick, mama ♪
translation.ja: 踊れ 踊れ   これは自由なダンス

translation.en: Listen to me. This is Simon Ambrose.
[ OVER SPEAKER ] I order you to shoot Xiang Ping!
translation.ja: ジャン･ピン首相を撃て！

translation.en: Time to get out of here.
- His pulse is dropping. - Don't lose him.
translation.ja: 危険です 助けるのよ

translation.en: [ TIBETAN TEACHER ] Open your heart, English,
translation.ja: 心の扉を開け ジョニー

translation.en: I won't kiss you, if you don't mind.
Sir? What are you doing, sir?
Guideline 17-5. Never question a senior agent in the field.
translation.ja: “ルール 17-５番 現場では先輩に質問するな”
仲間を だませても―

translation.en: but you can't get away from Johnny Eng--
[ PRIME MINISTER ] I couldn't be more delighted. Vortex's paymasters have been arrested,
translation.ja: ボルテックスを雇った者も 逮捕され―

translation.en: and China has expressed its gratitude to both Britain and the service.
translation.ja: 中国側から政府とＭＩ-７に 謝辞が届いている

translation.en: We owe English a great deal.
translation.ja: 中国側から政府とＭＩ-７に 謝辞が届いている ジョニーの おかげだ

translation.en: Well, reinstating his knighthood is a truly lovely gesture.
translation.ja: 彼をナイトに 復位させるのね

translation.en: And it'll mean the world to him.
Her Majesty will be with him shortly.

translation.ja: 捕まえた 今度こそ

translation.en: Got you! You old hag! [ SHRIEKING ]
[ JOHNNY ] I've just about had enough of you, you old cow!
translation.ja: 今度こそ逃がさん クソババア！
ナメるなよ ペガサス！
イングリッシュ！ 香港の掃除女だ とうとう捕まえた！

translation.en: It's the killer cleaner! [ SOBBING ] Finally, I've got her!
translation.ja: 香港の掃除女だ とうとう捕まえた！

translation.en: You never know when it's over, do you?

translation.ja: この！ この！ この！

translation.en: I don't know how to thank you.
